name: Spicy Shrimp (Chingri Maach)
author: TAVARUM
summary: This Indian (Bengali) spicy shrimp curry can be made with a variable amount of spice, and goes great with basmati rice or naan.
ingredients: 2  green chile peppers, seeded and minced
directions: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a large skillet, and cook and stir onions until golden brown, about 8 minutes
Stir in tomato and cook for 2 minutes
Stir in garlic paste, turmeric, garam masala, green chile peppers, and salt, and cook for 2 minutes more
Reduce heat to low, add the shrimp, and cook and stir over low heat until the shrimp are bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, about 8 minutes
Add a small amount of water if needed; the sauce should be thick
